release.action: Users can now click on spans and edges and see some information about these edges in an additional window. This is particularly useful for presenting features and their weights for spans and edges. The best of providing this information is via the thebeast format.
Square brackets in thebeast files files now don't cause any more problems.
UTF-8 files are better supported now..
Square brackets in tab files now don't cause any more problems.
When a format loader finishes before reaching the upper limit of instance index the progress bar is properly closed now.
The token filter text fields show example range expressions.
Tokens can now be filtered using an index range FROM-TO.

Edge identities during diff can be different from edge identities for rendering: an edge can appear differently but still be scored as the same edge. This allows clients to add information to an edge that makes the graph more readable (for example, relation IDs) without changing the diff semantics.
removed checkbox for drawing separation lines (always drawn).
